title: What does it mean for unmarried women to see a hippopotamus in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a hippopotamus in a dream: The hippopotamus is one of the famous animals that a person sees in his dream, and through the specialized Egyptian website, we are always ready to provide the important interpretations that were explained by great translators such as Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. The hippopotamus in a dream: There are three indicators that interpreters give about the appearance of the hippopotamus in a dream. The dream is as follows: First: If a person sees him in his dream, then this scene is interpreted as a person who enjoys dignity and high status, and everyone looks at him with respect and appreciation. Second: This animal indicates that the dreamer is a pure person with a clean heart, who wants good for all people and is peaceful and does not know Something about aggression and betrayal. Third: Some interpreters have realized that the hippopotamus or what is called (the generous master) in waking life shows that the dreamer is a person who loves his work and seeks through it to bring money that will make him self-sufficient and does not need to borrow from anyone. Still Don't find an explanation for your dream? Go to Google and search for an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Since the hippopotamus is an animal, most of the interpretations of animals in a dream will apply to it, such as the following: If the dreamer sees him chasing him in a dream, but the dreamer escapes from him intelligently and without a scratch on his body, this is a sign of... The harm that almost befell him, but God wrote salvation for him. Ibn Shaheen explained the appearance of this animal in the vision that the dreamer is a generous person and the types of generosity, the most important of which are material generosity and moral generosity: The first type: It indicates the dreamer’s generosity and loves to give others money to meet their needs and instill peace. And comfort in their hearts. The second type: What does generosity of feelings or self-control and tenderness mean? This type of generosity, from the point of view of some, is more important and stronger than the previous type, because many people need love and kindness more than material things. One of the bad scenes in a dream is killing the dreamer. A hippopotamus in his dream, and Ibn Sirin said that this vision has a large number of negative meanings, the most important of which is that the dreamer is failing in one aspect of his life. . This failure may be general throughout his life, and one of the most prominent manifestations of this failure is the following: The dreamer may face professional problems that make him leave his job and he will find himself surrounded by many financial losses after that. Perhaps the intended failure in the dream is the viewer’s inability to continue in an emotional relationship Thus, he may remain alone without a lover for a long time until he deeply studies the elements of successful romantic relationships and re-enters another relationship that can. Succeed and continue. Ibn Sirin showed that the dreamer can completely stop achieving certain goals that he has previously set, otherwise he will face many obstacles on his way to reaching them. The first reason: Perhaps the dreamer has set goals in life that are stronger than his level of abilities, as one of the criteria for a person’s success In achieving his aspirations is to know the upper limit of his abilities and skills, and thus future goals are set. they. The foundation, and if the dreamer does the opposite, he will face many challenges in the coming period

title: Interpretation of seeing a burning woman in a dream by leading scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a burning woman in a dream: Burning is one of the worst things that can happen to a person and causes him severe physical and psychological pain. If you see a burning woman in front of you, you will be very hurt, so what about seeing her in a dream? We will explain this in detail in the following lines of the article and other symbols such as burning the face, hand, etc. Interpretation of seeing a woman burned in a dream. Jurists mentioned many interpretations of seeing a woman burned in a dream, the most important of which are the following: If you see a woman burned in your dream, this is a sign of many... Of the pressures and fears that you are exposed to in your life, which cause you sadness and psychological exhaustion. Seeing a woman burning in fire until she goes out in a dream can be a sign of the end of the difficulties that this person faces in his life and solutions to happiness, contentment, and peace of mind. When a person dreams of a woman burning from above Down, it leads him to commit many prohibitions and sins, but he wants to repent and leave these wrong things. In the event that he sees a woman burning during sleep and the dreamer feels severe psychological pain, the dream proves that he is exposed to many obstacles in his life, but he can face them and overcome them. To obtain The correct interpretation, do a search on Google, a site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Interpretation of seeing a burning woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin - may God have mercy on him - explained that the dream of seeing a burning woman has many interpretations, the most important of which are the following: Seeing a burning woman in a dream means that The dreamer will be affected by tension, anxiety, and distress during this period of his life, and this dream also indicates that he will face a difficult situation that will affect him negatively. If you see a fire coming out of a woman’s body during sleep, this is a sign that the dreamer is a person capable of taking responsibility and controlling the course of things. People around him can depend on him for that. Advice and advice due to his intelligence and common sense. Interpretation of seeing a woman burning in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees herself or another woman burning in her dream, this is a sign that she will approach her marriage to a person she loves, who has a good personality, and with whom she will feel happy and comfortable. Psychological. If a girl dreams that she is standing in the middle of a fire and burning, this leads to feeling the pressure of this period and the failure of her life’s affairs in the way she desires. When a girl dreams that she is saving a woman from burning, this indicates that she is a gentle and kind-hearted person and always feels that she needs Support those around her and cry if she is exposed to something. In a bad situation, according to the interpretation of Sheikh Ibn Shirin. Imam Al-Sadiq explained that seeing an unmarried woman burning in her sleep indicates a positive change that will occur in her life during the next period of her life. Interpretation of seeing a woman burning in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that a woman is burning in front of her. This is a sign that God - Glory be to Him - will grant her and her partner a pregnancy soon. If a woman dreams that she is setting herself on fire, this leads to severe depression and her desire

title: The meaning of the moon in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of the moon in a dream seeks to be interpreted by many people, as it is often a very good dream and indicates the relationship of the slave with his master and many good things. The interpretation of the vision varies according to the social status of the pioneer and according to the details in the vision and shape, size and color of the moon and the number of moons in the dream in this The article will talk about the interpretation of this vision in some details. Read also: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream The meaning of the moon in a dream The meaning of the moon in a dream Seeing the moon in a dream indicates many signs, including: The great scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted that seeing the moon in a dream means that the dreamer will reach status and prestige. High. It also indicates the good deeds of the dreamer through which he draws closer to God Almighty. Seeing the moon in a dream means that the dreamer will earn lawful money and his life will change for the better, God willing, and God knows best. But if he sees the moon small, this indicates his fear of the future, the weakness of his character, and his illness, and God knows best. Read also: Washing the dead. Interpretation of seeing the moon in a dream for a single girl. An unmarried woman seeing the moon in a dream is a good vision, as it has many connotations, including: When a girl sees the moon in a dream, this indicates the affection and tenderness of her heart. If a girl sees the moon when it is full, this indicates On her feeling of optimism and happiness. But if she sees that the moon is not full, this indicates her sadness and distress, but she prays and gets closer to God, and God willing, this sadness will go away. If a person sees the crescent in a dream, this indicates goodness and success, God willing. If she sees the moon in color Red, this indicates a dispute between her and her fiancé, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees the moon in yellow, this indicates her illness, and God knows best. But the silver color of the moon indicates her imminent engagement, God willing. As for the golden color, it indicates the approaching marriage, God willing. Read also: Penguin in a dreamInterpretation of the moon in a dream for a married womanSeeing the moon in a married woman’s dream indicates her life and her husband as follows: When a married woman sees the moon in a dream, this indicates the comfort and good condition she is experiencing, whether material or social. But if he sees the moonlight At home, this indicates that there are some financial problems, and God knows best. Interpretation of the moon in a pregnant woman’s dream: Seeing a pregnant woman on the moon in a dream is a good vision. Among the interpretations of this vision: The moon in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the health of the fetus and that its birth will be easy, God willing. If a pregnant woman sees the full moon in a dream, this means that her newborn will reach a great status, God willing. Read also: Washing the dead. Interpretation of seeing two moons in dreams. Many people dream about the moon and this worries them a lot. Scientists explained this vision as follows: When a person sees two moons in a dream, this indicates the existence of love and friendship in general, whether between siblings, friends, or lovers. When a single person sees two moons in a dream, this indicates the approaching engagement, books of the Qur’an, or marriage, and God knows best. It is possible that Refers to traps

title: Interpretation of Ibn Sirin in the dream of joining university for unmarried and pregnant women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about studying at a university: It is possible for a person to see in a dream many different dreams that may not occur to him, so he sees study or training in a dream for which he may not know the appropriate interpretation, as interpretation scholars have developed many different interpretations and connotations of this dream, as Every interpretation of an unmarried girl is different from the interpretation of a dream of a married or pregnant woman and the like, and through the following article we will present to you the interpretation of the dream of studying at university. Interpretation of the dream of studying at university in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin has made long strides in developing the correct interpretations of the dream of enrolling in university. It should be noted that his interpretations of the dream of enrolling in university were as follows: Ibn Sirin believes that reciting the Qur’an in a dream is evidence of guidance after going astray. Also, learning the Qur’an in a dream indicates the transition from the stage of poverty to wealth and change for the better with regard to the fortuneteller’s circumstances. He indicates To the marriage of an unmarried young man and his relationship in the near future. Seeing a married man learning the Qur’an in a dream indicates the birth of a son and the provision of good offspring. Also, with regard to seeing a teacher in a dream, it indicates perfection, useful work, and the desire to complete the tasks entrusted to him, and God is Most High and knows that. See also: Interpretation of a dream about twins in a dream for a single, married, and pregnant woman by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about studying at a university. There are many connotations and meanings that scholars have explained in interpreting a dream about joining a university in a dream, which are as follows: If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is teaching people and studying for them, this indicates The dreamer's love is for the benefit of people, and God is supreme and most knowledgeable. Also, if the dreamer sees himself in a dream that he knows people, this means that he will be tempted and exposed to it. Seeing a lot of study in the dream, in this vision, is a sign of interest, logic, correct vision, and penetration in the dreamer's life In general, school and studies in a dream mean the pioneer’s ample diet, increasing money and collecting salaries. To have a dream about studying and staying late at school, this indicates searching for land and looking for opportunities to improve income. Diligence in studies and fatigue in dreams is evidence of demand. Martyrdom for the sake of God is for a righteous and pure person. Seeing an unmarried young man in a dream at school indicates a close marriage and a relationship with a good girl, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If one sees that studying in a dream and feels happy and relaxed, this indicates the dreamer’s love for knowledge and education and his striving to reach levels Higher in life. See also: Interpretation of the dream of engagement in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Studying at the university. Interpretation of the dream for single people. Many different interpretations have appeared to interpret the dream of one girl studying, including the following: Seeing a school in a dream for an unmarried girl shows the girl’s life and her desire to succeed in it and overcome The difficulties you face in it. Seeing the school in a dream and the large number of students in it in this vision is

title: Interpretation of porcelain in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Pottery in a dream for an unmarried girl and a pregnant married woman Seeing a vase Ibn Sirin Antiques Household utensils Empty plate Interpretation of pottery and porcelain in a dream Whoever sees porcelain in a dream, this is evidence that he will have a favorable opportunity to advance in his practical affairs. If the china is broken in a dream, or the dreamer sees that it is dirty, this is evidence that he may commit some mistakes in his life or even a serious crime for which he will be held accountable. If the dreamer is a girl and sees that she has beautiful and clean porcelain pots in her dream, this indicates that she will be an economical and secretive housekeeper with those around her. This dream has another meaning for the girl, which is that she will marry a straight and strong man. If the dreamer in the pottery industry is male and has a job to take care of, this dream is an indication to him that there is a benefit awaiting him. If the dreamer sees a warehouse with empty shelves in which there are no vessels, this is a bad omen, because it warns him of losing what is close to him. If a woman dreams that she is decorating or arranging her Chinese porcelain possessions, this foretells that she will enjoy a happy home and will be an economical and successful housekeeper. If a Chinese porcelain merchant dreams that his warehouse appears empty, this foretells that he will find the opposite of what he wants to do and a difficult period will follow. Interpretation of the vision of Professor Iyad Al-Adwan in the pottery industry - YouTube

title: Interpretation of seeing a personal card in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a personal card in a dream through the website Vision roy2a.com. Every person in all countries has a personal card with a national number that proves his identity. Interpretation of seeing a personal card in a dreamFor great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the status of the fortuneteller. Whether he is male, single, or married. Interpretation of seeing an ID card in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a drawing of an ID card in a dream. It indicates the fulfillment of a desire that the dreamer longs for. Seeing a delay in receiving the ID card in a dream indicates that the dreamer will face many problems and crises in his life in the future. The coming period. Loss of identity in a dream: It appears that the viewer feels a lot of fear and anxiety about the future and what will happen in it. Loss of identity in a dream: It indicates a large number of evil people in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a torn identity card in a dream: It indicates many worries and anxieties in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a beautiful picture of a personal card in a dream states that the viewer is experiencing a state of stability and reassurance in his life. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing someone spying on me in a dream Interpretation of seeing a personal card in a dream for a single woman Seeing a single woman pulling out a personal card in a dream shows that the next period of her life will be Completely different from her previous life. An ID card in a dream for single people. It indicates that her life will be full of stability, happiness, and contentment. Loss of identity in a dream for single people. It indicates many disagreements and problems between her and her partner that may lead to separation, and God knows best. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a person who He gave me pillows in a dream. Interpretation of the appearance of an identity in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman’s identity in a dream indicates an improvement in her conditions and circumstances in the coming period. The issue of identity in a dream for a married woman shows that there will be many positive changes in her physical condition in the coming period. A torn identity in a dream for a married woman, which indicates It indicates the occurrence of many problems and crises in her marital life. Interpretation of the appearance of a personal card in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing an ID card holder in a dream and remembering that she will soon undergo childbirth and that she and her child will be in good health, and God knows best. A bank card in a dream for the owner: It announces a lot of good and abundant sustenance for her and her child. Interpretation of the vision of searching for identity in a dream. The vision of searching for identity in a dream is the dreamer’s quest in his life to reach his goals and achieve great success, and God knows best. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a person sleeping on my lap in a dream. Interpretation of seeing receiving an ID card in a dream. Seeing receiving an ID card in a dream shows that insight She is a person with a high ability to make all the right decisions about his life. Changing identity in a dream indicates the great efforts made by the dreamer to make positive changes in his life, and God knows best. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing someone sweeping his house in a dream.

Loss of identity in a dream: It indicates a large number of evil people in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a torn identity card in a dream: It indicates many worries and anxieties in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a beautiful picture of a personal card in a dream states that the viewer is experiencing a state of stability and reassurance in his life. title: Interpretation of offering sugar in a dream

preview.html: Seeing sugar carries more than one meaning, which varies depending on what the person saw in his dream. Below is the interpretation of this dream from Mufsir.com. Interpretation of giving sugar in a dream to a single girlIf a single woman sees in her dream that she is giving sugar to someone. This is evidence that she has pure and pure intentions. She is also characterized by giving. Giving sugar in a dream is a sign that her heart is full of faith. Her love of taking initiative in doing good, as well as her desire to thank others for what they have given her. Being drunk by someone in her dream heralds her marriage or engagement soon, in addition to Her intense love for that person. Seeing someone giving her sugar is a sign of that person’s desire to be kind and close to her in a romantic way. Also, seeing someone giving her sugar is good news about a lot of sustenance and abundance of goodness after the hardships and hardships she has been exposed to. This The dream is also an indication of the fulfillment of deep-rooted desires inside. When she sees that someone is giving her sugar and she feels the taste of sweetness in her dream. This is evidence of her good qualities. Also, if she saw that she was finding bags of sugar during her sleep. This is evidence that she will be blessed with an inheritance that will bring She has a lot of money, God willing. See also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing sugar in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of giving sugar in a dream to a married woman. If a married woman sees that she is giving sugar in her dream, this is a sign of her trying to spread affection and love among people. It is also an indication of her willingness to give and sacrifice. Without compensation, and her good judgment of situations. Seeing her giving sugar in a dream is a sign of obedience to her husband. The righteousness of her transformation, the strength of her faith, and her willingness to perform tasks. This vision also indicates the inheritance, rewards, and gifts that he will have a share in. Seeing her giving sugar also portends the death of her worries and sorrows and her passing To a better life dominated by peace of mind, stability and tranquility. Likewise, seeing a married woman in a dream carrying a bag of sugar for her husband. This indicates her intense love for her husband, obedience to him, and good company with him. If she sees that she is sprinkling sugar in the dream, this is a better omen than a close marriage of her daughter to a husband who is Knowledge of religion and morals. Sugar in a married woman’s dream indicates good money and the stability of her married life and that she and her husband are planning for a better future. Interpretation of a dream about giving sugar in a dream to a divorced woman. When a divorced woman dreams that her old husband gives her sugar. This is a sign of her returning to her husband and the integrity of her married life. If she sees If a divorced woman drinks sugar in a dream, this refers to the family and friends around her who love and support her in her life. As she sees in her dream that she is buying sugar, this is a sign of the disappointment and sadness she feels because of her separation from her husband. At other times, buying sugar indicates... The dream indicates positive changes that will occur in her life. Her relationship with a man of good character and kind heart will compensate her for what she saw in her previous life. Read also: Interpretation of the dream of distributing sweets to people. Interpretation of the vision of giving sugar in a dream to a man and its meaning.

title: Interpretation of a dream about an abandoned house in a dream

preview.html: Interpretations of dreams of an abandoned house: An abandoned house in a dream indicates the presence of evil people in the life of the dreamer, as it indicates worries and sorrows, and that the dreamer commits many sins and disobedience, or his distance from God and his shortcomings in worship and vision. It may indicate financial hardship. Time Sports channel frequency. Interpretation of a dream about an abandoned house for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is visiting an abandoned house, it indicates the death of someone close to her. But if a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is building an abandoned house, it is a sign of exhaustion, insomnia, and poor psychological state. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is building an abandoned house, In a dream that he leaves an abandoned house, it indicates her freedom from worry and sadness. Seeing an abandoned house in a dream for a married woman. What if a married woman sees in her dream that she is renovating an abandoned building? It indicates the collapse of problems, anxiety, and sadness. But if a married woman dreams that she lives in an abandoned house, this is evidence of many problems. And quarrels or abandonment by her husband. Seeing a married woman in her dream may mean that she has an abandoned house. Elements of love and affection in their lives. Entering and exiting an abandoned house in a dream for a single woman. If he sees a single woman in a dream, he walks into an abandoned house. You do not know any sign of it. An indication of her engagement to a man of bad reputation and bad character. It could indicate problems and trials that the girl is going through. Interpretation of dreams to escape from a haunted house. A vision indicates that goblins in a dream control feelings of anxiety and fear on the dreamer’s soul. And if he sees that he lives in a haunted house, this indicates the presence of an evil person. In the life of a fortuneteller. I mean seeing an orc inside the dream in general. The dream is the presence of fear and dread of the unknown, the future, a particular person or event. Social media. Interpretation of a dream about escaping from the jinn for a married woman. Seeing the fear of jinn in a married woman’s dream. There are bad people in her life who do not want good for her. It also indicates On sadness, anxiety, and bad news. Fear of scoliosis in a dream, evidence that you are hearing good news. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is afraid of evil, this portends a lot of goodness and pleasure, God willing. Names decorated with a symbol of an abandoned house in an unmarried woman’s dream. If he sees a single woman in a dream, he has an abandoned house, an indication of the presence of hypocrites. In her life. Also, if a single woman sees an abandoned house in a dream, there are elements of stress and anxiety in her life. What if he sees single in a dream that he is renovating an abandoned house? It indicates fatigue and suffering in her life and an attempt to escape from problems. Interpretation of a dream about a lonely, scary place. If a girl sees single if she is afraid of a specific place in the dream, this indicates anxiety and tension in her life. It also indicates the presence of people in her life that she does not trust. If she sees that she is afraid of those around her, this indicates her fear of relationships and her fear of being desired by many people. Jokes Interpretation of a dream about walking in an unknown place The hospital is a long, dark and unknown road that shows the commission of sins and disobedience, and many errors of insight. Seeing the fear of the dark street inside a dream for single people is evidence of her fear of the consequences. And her desire to stay away from sin and return to sin

title: The 20 most important interpretations of seeing a clock in a dream

preview.html: The clock in a dream is one of the visions that some people try to understand its meaning, and therefore many different interpretations are presented by scholars about watching the clock during sleep and the interpretation of buying and selling it, etc., and the visitor can also find out the interpretation. Of time, according to Ibn Sirin, all he has to do is start the round. The clock in a dream. When the dreamer sees the clock in a dream, this proves that there is a change in his psychological and moral state. If one sees the shape of the clock in a wonderful way and things go well, it expresses the path of life. A person is in a special and wonderful way as he wishes, and if a person finds a watch in his hand, his hands move precisely, which indicates his ability to communicate wonderfully in his life. When the dreamer sees his watch in a dream and then looks at it, this symbolizes his ability to retain every word he utters. With it, he can fulfill any covenant. Help him pay off debts. If a merchant finds a wristwatch in a dream and looks at it with joy, this means that he will receive many benefits and interests due to his work throughout the days. At the right time in a dream shows the dreamer's desire to control his situation. When a person sees a clock during sleep and notices that it is ticking audibly, it expresses the need to pay attention to what he does during this period. If the dreamer notices his vision of the clock and the minutes are moving slowly, no matter how much passes Of time in a dream, this symbolizes his inability to be patient when something happens that he was waiting for. The clock in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The clock was not invented in the time of Ibn Sirin, but he talked about the time of the day and night, and therefore some interpretations are interpreted according to it. The night is during sleep It leads to a feeling of calm, reassurance, and relaxation. On the contrary, if the dreamer’s feeling in the dream is full of negative emotions, whether it is day or night, this proves the emergence of some problems that cause him great suffering and may make him unable to continue his life well. Therefore, it is better for him to look for ways through which he can start better. Seeing a clock in a dream represents the approach of comfort and the disappearance of sadness, and one will be able to enjoy all the joys of life, to increase his source of income. If the dreamer finds a clock hanging on the wall during his sleep, then this It means that he heard new news that will make him happy in the future. Which has a website Secrets of Interpretation of Dreams From Google, you can see many interpretations and questions about followers. The watch in the dream of single womenIf an unmarried woman sees a watch in a dream and is happy to see it, this indicates her desire to achieve Something she desperately desires, like marrying someone she loves. Btuch was taking a long time to get something. When a virgin sees herself buying a watch in her dream, this symbolizes her ability to change some of the bad qualities in her personality that require a lot of effort from her, and she has wonderful opportunities that will not be repeated in her life and she must seize them. It indicates Seeing a silver watch in a dream indicates that someone will die

title: Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansAl-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing ants in a dream indicates that they will earn a lot of money through a new project. To see ants in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees in her dream a large number of ants entering her home, this means that she will earn a lot of money. In addition to Therefore, this vision symbolizes the happy life that this woman lives, as well as the peace of mind and stability in which she lives. I would like to see black ants. It is a good sign for her that God will soon bless her with pregnancy. Also, if the woman is pregnant, this is a sign that she will give birth to a male by God Almighty’s command. As for If she sees ants leaving her house, this portends many losses. She will see termites in the case of one, two, or three ants. This is interpreted by the number of females that this female will give birth to. This dream is a sign that the woman is exposed to many problems and faces many pressures and difficulties in the field of Its work. Seeing dead ants is interpreted as good, a lot of food and a lot of money. Interpretation of seeing small black ants in a dream refers to family and family visits and gatherings. Seeing small black ants indicates the presence of a large number of children and an increase in offspring. Also, this dream It interprets the death of a person in a state of illness. Many interpreters say that seeing black ants portends problems and difficulties and stresses that the dreamer will fall into them. It also indicates the imminent and sad situation in which the dreamer lives. It indicates the accumulation of debts on the viewer, and the financial loss that he will suffer In his life. Such a vision is a clear sign that the dreamer is surrounded by many enemies and that the people who are conspiring for him want to harm him. It is also considered in the dream of a married woman an indication of the presence of disagreements and problems between her and her husband. Seeing black ants in general portends the opinion that there are people Close to him, they have envy and hatred in their hearts for him and wish goodness and blessings in his hand. See also: - Interpretation of a dream about black ants in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi. Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream on the bed. Commentators agree: Ants on the bed. It symbolizes bringing a lot of goodness, raising children and money. This person will die as He sees ants flying from the bed and the patient is on the bed. Seeing ants in the bed of an unmarried girl is interpreted as the imminent date of her official engagement. It is also an indication of the presence of many loyal friends in his life, who give him all feelings of love and loyalty. This vision symbolizes positive opportunities Which will be available to a woman in her life and is evidence of the wealth that she will obtain in all aspects of her life. To see ants in a dream for a single woman. This vision is an indication of this girl’s constant and continuous thinking about her future. It also symbolizes her marriage and that God will bless her with children. This is a lot of ants in an unmarried woman’s dream. Married woman, this indicates many sins and this girl committing sins. It also leads to the presence of many
